priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire COMM Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C100158

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire COMM Test Code Terminology

definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure test code.
name: Current Opioid Misuse Measure Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire COMM Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Current Opioid Misuse Measure Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you had trouble with thinking clearly or had memory problems?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Trouble Thinking Clearly or Memory Problems

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often do people complain that you are not completing necessary tasks? (i.e., doing things that need to be done, such as going to class, work or appointments)

Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you had to go to someone other than your prescribing physician to get sufficient pain relief from medications? (i.e., another doctor, the Emergency Room, friends, street source)
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Other Sources for Pain Medication

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you taken your medications differently from how they are prescribed?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Taken Medications Other Than Prescribed

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you seriously thought about hurting yourself?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Seriously Thought of Hurting Self

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how much of your time was spent thinking about opioid medications (having enough, taking them, dosing schedule, etc.)?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Time Spent Thinking About Opioids

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you been in an argument?
Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you had trouble controlling your anger (e.g., road rage, screaming, etc.)?
Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you needed to take pain medications belonging to someone else?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Take Medications Belonging to Others

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you been worried about how you're handling your medications?
Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have others been worried about how you're handling your medications?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Others Worry About Your Medications

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you had to make an emergency phone call or show up at the clinic without an appointment?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Emergency Phone Call or Clinic Visit

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you gotten angry with people?
Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you had to take more of your medication than prescribed?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Take More Medication Than Prescribed

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you borrowed pain medication from someone else?
Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you used your pain medicine for symptoms other than for pain (e.g., to help you sleep, improve your mood, or relieve stress)?
terms.preferredTerm: COMM - Used Pain Medicine For Other Symptoms
synonyms: COMM1-Used Pain Meds For Other Symptoms

terms.definition: Current Opioid Misuse Measure - In the past 30 days, how often have you had to visit the Emergency Room?
